name: Wooden Chest
description: An old wooden chest. It has remained sturdy throughout the years.

name: Iron Chest
description: A sturdy iron chest. It is dented in some places.

name: Silver Chest
description: An ornate silver chest. It gleams in the torchlight.

name: Golden Chest
description: A gilded chest. Even in the darkest dungeon, it shines brightly.
